TopicTitle: [1.2] PlanetShine - v0.2.5.2 stable - v0.5 experimental [4 October 2016]

Articles.Content: Why this mod is so slow updating? once per year? or more?

4 hours ago, popos1 said:

Why this mod is so slow updating? once per year? or more?

I'm going to assume it was not your intention, but your post comes across as entitled and demanding, I'm afraid.

Modders are under no obligation to update their mods. They create and maintain them for free. Perhaps real life got in the way, or perhaps the creator of this mod simply got bored with KSP and moved on to other things, as they're perfectly free to do.

As others have reported in previous recent posts, this mod appears to continue to work just fine in KSP 1.4.1, so there's no real need to update it at all.

6 hours ago, ZobrAA said:

It's working on KSP 1.4.1 but spams this into log: -snip-

I don't get those entries in my log. Perhaps they're caused by another mod?

@popos1

The majority of free things tend to have a more chaotic dynamics.

Be glad that it works.

14 hours ago, UnanimousCoward said:

I don't get those entries in my log. Perhaps they're caused by another mod?

Deleting PlanetShine clears that spam. So...

Maybe you have different mod version?

Edited March 25, 2018 by ZobrAA

1 hour ago, ZobrAA said:

Deleting PlanetShine clears that spam. So...

Still could be an other mod that freaks out when PlanetShine is installed, or?

1 hour ago, ZobrAA said:

Maybe you have different mod version?

Version 0.2.5.2 - same version it's been for about a year and a half.

Got it!

SpaletShine 0.2.5.2 + HullCameraVDS v0.1.9 = log spam:

Oh well... bye-bye hull cam...

For those that may be interested:

@Valerian has not been around to support this mod since July.  As a result, I've decided to adopt this mod and continue support.  So, I've released a  KSP 1.4.x version and created a new thread here:

If @Valerian returns, I will gladly relinquish support and assist in any way to get him back up to speed.

Thanks for updating PlanetShine, I gladly approve your decision of adopting the mod and will help you with it if needed.

Edited March 28, 2018 by Valerian

1 hour ago, Valerian said:

Thanks for updating PlanetShine, I gladly approve your decision of adopting the mod and will help you with it if needed.

Thank you kind sir!  I will try not to break it!
Is there a similar mod to this anyone is using?

5 minutes ago, fireblade274 said:

Is there a similar mod to this anyone is using?

Probably the one linked 3 comments above yours...

5 minutes ago, Galileo said:

Probably the one linked 3 comments above yours...

Yeah I saw that, i was referring to a different mod that achieved a similar purpose, not the same mod but updated.

6 minutes ago, fireblade274 said:

Yeah I saw that, i was referring to a different mod that achieved a similar purpose, not the same mod but updated. 

Then, no there isn’t another mod like this one.
Okay, thank you for letting me know
